sentence.Network_en: The living organisms somehow concentrated the minerals by biological processes.
sentence.Network_cn: 生命体通过某种生物过程聚集矿物质。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Prescott concentrated on offering a classic restatement of Labour values.
sentence.Network_cn: 普雷斯科特先生专注于对工党价值观进行经典的阐释。

sentence.Network_en: Most development has been concentrated in and around cities.
sentence.Network_cn: 土地开发主要集中在城市及周边地区。

list.abs: 传统的测定方法最常用的结果表达是PC20。P表示“激发的（provoking）“；C表示激发剂的“浓度（concentration）“；20表示通气功能指标下降20%。所以，PC20即引起通气功能指标（如FEV1）下降20%的激发剂.

Great Scientists教案 ... impress v. 印, 留下印象 5.concentrate v. 集中注意力 1. conclude v. 断定， 得出结论; 结束（正式）；.
集中器（concentrator）(Concentrator)是连接终端、计算机或通信设备的中心连接点设备。它能成为电缆会合的中心点。
核能专业术语(7) ... concentration of ore by artificial radioactivity 人工放射性选矿 concentrator 浓缩器 concentric 同心的.

entry.def: A concentrated liquid has been increased in strength by having water removed from it.

example.ex: Sweeten dishes sparingly with honey, or concentrated apple or pear juice.
example.tran: 加一点蜂蜜或浓缩苹果汁或梨汁，让菜带点甜味。

entry.def: A concentrated activity is directed with great intensity in one place.

example.ex: ...a more concentrated effort to reach out to troubled kids.
example.tran: 把精力更多地集中在与问题儿童的沟通上

means.word_mean: 1. gathered together or made less diffuse;
2. of or relating to a solution whose dilution has been reduced

sentences.sentence: "her concentrated passion held them at bay"

means.word_mean: 4. being the most concentrated solution possible at a given temperature; unable to dissolve still more of a substance;

auth_sentence.content: Most of the underemployment is concentrated among part-time workers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Most of the underemployment is concentrated among part-time workers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Most of the underemployment is concentrated among part-time workers.

auth_sentence.content: I think it should be something like concentrated energy.
auth_sentence.res_content: I think it should be something like concentrated energy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I think it should be something like concentrated energy.

auth_sentence.content: Concentrated animal-feeding operations in the South also produce ammonia.
auth_sentence.res_content: Concentrated animal-feeding operations in the South also produce ammonia.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Concentrated animal-feeding operations in the South also produce ammonia.

Sentence.sentence: But while much of the research and innovation has concentrated on finding less-polluting energy alternatives, it may be decades before clean technologies like wind and solar meet a significant portion of our energy needs.
As for the drawbacks of illegal immigration, these, too, are concentrated.

sentences.en: The liquid is found in a highly concentrated form.
sentences.cn: 人们发现这种液体呈高度浓缩状。

means.word_mean: 全神贯注的,全力以赴的, 决心要做的

sentences.en: He was calm and concentrated in judging how to defeat his opponent.
sentences.cn: 他冷静沉着,聚精会神地判断如何打败对手。
